sentences.sContent: Genes are spiraled, threadlike particles made of DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid).
sentences.sContent_eng: Genes are spiraled, threadlike particles made of DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid).
sentences.sCn: 基因是由DNA（脱氧核糖核酸）组成的丝状螺旋微粒。

sentences.sContent: The red threadlike filaments are composed of cool gas suspended by a magnetic field.
sentences.sContent_eng: The red threadlike filaments are composed of cool gas suspended by a magnetic field.
sentences.sCn: 红色细长的丝状体是由冷却下来的气体组成，气体处于磁场中。

words.tran: 线的；粘丝状的；纤维构成的；纤细的
线；螺纹；思路；衣服；线状物；玻璃纤维；路线
穿过；穿线于（thread的过去分词）
